title: Celebrate Chinese New Year 2025 with Zong 4G’s exclusive IDD Pak-China friendship bundles
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 28 (APP):This Chinese New Year, Zong 4G, Pakistan’s leading telecom Network, continues its tradition of delivering the best calling offers and exceptional experiences for its international callers with the launch of the IDD Pak-China Friendship Bundles said a news release.
These exclusive offers ensure that staying connected with loved ones in China has never been easier or more affordable.
Zong 4G introduces a range of prepaid bundles tailored to suit every communication need. Customers can choose from the China Offer 75 Mins bundle for just PKR 325, valid for 7 days, or the China Offer 150 Mins bundle at PKR 625, offering 150 minutes of talk time for 15 days.
For those seeking extended connectivity, the China Offer 300 Mins bundle provides 300 minutes for PKR 1150, valid for 30 days, while the China Offer 600 Mins bundle offers a generous 600 minutes for PKR 2000, also valid for 30 days.
These attractive bundles reaffirm Zong 4G’s commitment to enhancing customer convenience and celebrating the strong bond between Pakistan and China. With unmatched calling rates and reliable connectivity, Zong 4G remains the preferred choice for international callers.
Make this Chinese New Year memorable by staying close to your loved ones in China with Zong 4G’s affordable and seamless communication solutions.
